::Slayer::

Mech fluid running down from his leg unto the snow, Slayer growls, 
hovering a few feet above the ground.

"Danger is irrelevant," he says, his mind slipping into a logistic 
state as it had done several times since he had been put online by 
Prebon, "Prepare to meet the pit."

Slayer aims his shoulder launchers at Lunarpine, firing two missiles 
at him.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> (OK, sorry bout the name thing)
> 
> Lunarpine feals like he'd just gone a few rounds with a cybernetic 
Mike
> Tyson but knew Slayer wouldn't be very happy about losing a leg. He 
rolled
> across the snow avoiding most of the shots.He comes to his feet 
ready for
> action, mech fluid dripping from the holes in his frame. "You 
haven't given
> up yet? it's your spark on the line." he steps forward waiting for 
Slayers
> next move.
